definition: geoduck (Panopea abrupta)/elephant trunk clam/same as 象拔蚌[xiang4 ba2 bang4]
SELENE, Japanese lunar orbiter spacecraft, launched in 2007

sentences.english: A three-year-old girl is now a new living goddess in Nepal.
sentences.chinese: 一名三歲女孩，現在是一個新的活女神在尼泊爾。

sentences.english: O for my sake do you with Fortune chide.
sentences.chinese: 哦，請爲我把命運的女神詬讓。

sentences.english: A Nereid, goddess of the sea and the wife of Poseidon.
sentences.chinese: 海中仙女，海的女神，波塞頓之妻。

sentences.english: For many immigrants, the Statue of Liberty was the first sight they saw sailing into New York City.
sentences.chinese: 自由女神是許多移民到紐約的人第一個看到的目標。

sentences.english: Close-up of Statue of Liberty in New York City on Nov. 1, 1983. (AP Photo/ Dave Pickoff)
sentences.chinese: 1983年11月1日，紐約自由女神像的特寫。

sentences.english: This is a major Hindu festival honouring Mother Lakshmi – the goddess of wealth.
sentences.chinese: 這是印度的一個主要節日，是崇敬財富女神拉克希米。

sentences.english: Nereid, goddess of the sea and the wife of Poseidon.
sentences.chinese: 海中仙女，海的女神，波塞冬之妻。

sentences.english: Zhang Meng butterfly I love you, you are my goddess.
sentences.chinese: 我愛你張蒙山蝴蝶，您是我的女神。

sentences.english: Aphrodite was the goddess who triggered the Trojan War.
sentences.chinese: 阿佛羅狄忒是引發特洛伊戰爭的女神。

sentences.english: "Sing Goddess the wrath of Achilles  " right?
sentences.chinese: 唱出阿基利斯的憤怒吧，女神“對嗎？

sentences.english: Of course. Fan Bingbing is my Venus.
sentences.chinese: 當然了，范冰冰是我的女神啊。

sentences.english: Live in NYC and never been to the Statue of Liberty?
sentences.chinese: 居住在紐約市但是從來沒看過自由女神像？

sentences.english: Several goddesses argued over who was the most beautiful.
sentences.chinese: 衆女神對於誰纔是最美的女人爭論不休。

sentences.english: Hera is the most beautiful of the immortals. Her symbols were the peacock and the cow.
sentences.chinese: 赫拉是衆神中最美麗的女神，她的象徵是孔雀和母牛。

sentences.english: At this time, there is a goddess Nu Wa, in this vast wilderness walking.
sentences.chinese: 這時，有一位女神女媧，在這莽莽的原野上行走。

sentences.english: Kama is also the name of the Hindu Goddess of love.
sentences.chinese: 卡馬也是印度教女神的愛的名稱。

definition: (neologism c. 2009) don't worry, it's all taken care of
the prettiest girl in the school (see also 校草[xiao4 cao3])/school beauty queen/campus belle/prom queen
